name: Oxygen (Hyo, Naemis)
description:
I still hate Unity UI, why does it never work properly lmfao

PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN!

YOU NEED 3 HARPOONS TO KILL THE BOSS!

You are Steven, world-renowned treasure hunter. Well, maybe not for much longer. On your latest quest to find treasure, a vile sea monster destroyed your boat. Find your way back to the surface to survive this horrid encounter!

-    WASD to move, Space to speed up, Mouse to control the light, Mouse1 to fire the Harpoon

-    Watch your Oxygen meter! Refill it by breathing in large bubbles.

-    Fight the vile sea monster! Play through a single thrilling boss fight.

-    Look for treasure! Chests contain harpoons, which you will need to fight the boss.

Publicly used assets

Gravity Pixel Font

Underwater Ambience

GUI Sound Effects

Heartbeat Sound Effect

Submission to Mini Jam 84
